section.p: As you stretch out your hand, you loose your footing, and plummet to the ground, right between the two golems! They turn their heads with a grating rumble, and open their mouths to speak. The sound that comes out is a bell-like gonging that alerts the temple. You pick yourself up and fall back on the last resort of a rogue - running for your life! Warrior priests swarm out of the temple in pursuit.

Roll one die, and subtract one from the total.
